data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ji, Xiao-Hong, Vlasak, Josef, Tian, Xue-Mei, Dai, Yu-Cheng (2018): Three new species of Fomitiporella (Hymenochaetales, Basidiomycota) based on the evidence from morphology and DNA sequence data. MycoKeys 30: 73-89, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.30.23109, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.30.23109
